docs.title: Welcome to JED-FFM Docs
docs.text:
This guide walks you through common operations in the FFM app.

For more detail documentation contact support or visit JED Plc Official website.

docs.title: Step 1: Open the FFM App
docs.text:
1. Tap on "Bill Delivery" from the home menu.

  2. Select the customer from the list.

  3. Confirm and submit.
